test-method.description: TC-CART-02: Verify that the total cost for each item line is calculated correctly.

test-method.name: verifyNavigationToProductDetail
test-method.description: TC-PROD-08: Verify navigation to product detail page.

test-method.name: verifyNoProductsFoundMessage
test-method.description: TC-PROD-03: Verify 'No products found' message for invalid search.

test-method.name: verifyProductListIsDisplayed
test-method.description: TC-PROD-01: Verify that all products are listed on the page after a successful login.

test-method.name: verifySearchFiltersProducts
test-method.description: TC-PROD-02: Verify search functionality with a valid term.

test-method.name: verifyNavigationToLogin
test-method.description: TC-SPLASH-03: Verify navigation to the login screen after splash.

test-method.name: verifySplashScreenContent
test-method.description: TC-SPLASH-02: Verify that the TestHive logo and name are visible on the splash screen.

test-method.name: verifySplashScreenIsDisplayed
test-method.description: TC-SPLASH-01: Verify that the app launches successfully and the splash screen is displayed.
